attributes.title: BS
attributes.review: The app is completely messed up, in terms of coding. Not works. Very sad (not really 🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳)

attributes.title: not worth it 🤮horrible!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! it lags me out all the time.

attributes.title: NO NO NO NO NO NO
attributes.review: The other reviews pretty much sum it all up. I had the same exact experience as everyone else. Oompa Loompas killed granny, can’t watch ratatouille, now I’m dead and I can’t support my favorite dictator, all that good stuff. I can’t do this anymore. I just really need some ibuprofen because this app is giving me a headache HAHA sorry. I hate this app. It’s no bueno.

attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: This app is THE WORST kicked me out 6 times and made my phone glitch like not letting me charge my phone absolutely hate it the worst app I’ve ever had

attributes.title: Who in the hell put the muffins in the freezer?
attributes.review: I was simply just trying to find out who put my muffins in the freezer and this horrible app just kept bombarding me with Trump campaigns and rally’s. The app asked if I wanted notifications and I pressed NO as I always do, so WHY DID I SEE A TRUMP NOTIFICATION WHILE I WAS TAKING A PERIOD POO!! Overall the app is bad I do not recommend 🙃🙃.

attributes.title: do not download 😡😔
attributes.review: worst app ever ✨🧚🏻 just to keep it short all i’m gonna say is, immediately upon opening the app my phone crashed, my cat died, and my brother broke his arm. this app is terrible and it’s bad luck 👁👄👁😡😭

attributes.title: wHo iN ThE heLl pUt thE MuFfInS iN tHe freEzer✨🦖
attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded this app because I saw an orange 🍊 in one of the cover pages and I thought it was one of those games that u make smoothies but It wasn’t so i got up angry to go walk my car because it was thirsty but then we ran into a squirrel and so I had to ride my broom 💃🏻 because then I remembered that I had to mop the ocean bc my turtle peed on the ceiling and when i got home I got yelled at by a snail that was hopping on the street telling me to paint every house in the neighborhood with nail polish so i said under my breathe “shut up u belong to the streets”  but somehow it heard me and started attacking me 🥺 so I just did what he said. after that I went to the store to count every grain of rice they had, as i am happily sitting on the roof 😌 a Karen looks up at me and says “get off before I call the manager” I jumped off and spread out my legs and lifted up my shoulders hair over my face  and started chasing her white ass she started crying and tumbled over while everyone was laughing at her that was the best moment of my life. Anyways what y’all want from McDonald’s 😙

attributes.title: i just want some mcdonald’s
attributes.review: when i first got the app i saw president trump doing the blm fist!!! good for him!! so glad he is on our side now. but i have this a one star review bc he said he would date his daughter and republicans on tiktok are starting to get on my nerves 😁✨ps: kill all men- but not barron, i want to give him the biggest hug and tell him he has a whole side on tiktok who support him and is on his side ☺️❤️

attributes.title: Not gonna hate but I’m saying how we all feel
attributes.review: I’m not 100% sure if tik tok will get shut down but if it dose then u will have so many people mad at u. And all the people that may not be Abel to get another account on social media might lose their friend or family or whatever. If your goal is to make a lot of people sad and mad then u will do it by deleting tik tok... but I’m sure that’s not what u want right? I hope this was helpful to some people, ik this wasn’t about the app but people are trying to take down this app so tik tok won’t be taken down. We all know that by now, but so many people are gonna be effected if u want happiness to stay a little longer u can leave tik tok up. Idk about political stuff I don’t watch that stuff but u have a reasoning right trump? This is might get taken down if it can-.. just saying this will impact a lot of people like me and millions if that’s what u want then u have won I think.. sorry I made this like I was talking to trump lol cause ik I’m not just wanted to make it like I was so u knew how I really felt about this all.

attributes.title: Heck no ❤️
attributes.review: Horrible app and president both very much trash xx
